attributes.action: Bring back James Bond to free-to-air TV
attributes.additional_details:
Following Sky's purchase of the UK broadcast rights to the James Bond films, the vast majority of the British public will be now be unable to watch one of the UK’s most successful film series.

We believe that the Department for Culture, Media and Sport should consider granting Bond films the Free-to-Air status currently accorded to many sporting events.

This petition is to show support for Bond films to be shown on free-to-air television in the UK.
